Module com.example.pingpong
Package com.example.pingpong.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pingpong.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controls the flow and logic of the game, coordinating interactions between the model and the view.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameController(SceneToScene sceneController, GameView gameView)
    Constructs a GameController with references to the scene controller and the game view, initializing the game with default settings.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(SceneToScene sceneController, GameView gameView)
      Constructs a GameController with references to the scene controller and the game view, initializing the game with default settings.
      Parameters:
      sceneController - The scene controller for navigating between scenes.
      gameView - The game view to update the UI based on game state changes.

    • adjustGameComponentsToCurrentWindowSize

      public void adjustGameComponentsToCurrentWindowSize(Game game)
      Adjusts the game components sizes and positions based on the current window size.
      Parameters:
      game - The game whose components will be adjusted.

    • applySettings

      public void applySettings(GameSettings settings)
      Applies the settings from the GameSettings object to the game.
      Parameters:
      settings - The settings to be applied to the game.

    • getSettings

      public void getSettings()
      Retrieves settings from the current game and updates the GameSettings object.

    • checkForWin

      public boolean checkForWin(Player player)
      Checks if a player has won the game by reaching the maximum score.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check for a win condition.
      Returns:
      True if the player has won, false otherwise.

    • scorePoint

      public void scorePoint(Player scorer)
      Awards a point to the scoring player.
      Parameters:
      scorer - The player who scored.

    • handleGoal

      public void handleGoal(Player scorer)
      Handles the logic when a goal is scored in the game, including updating the score and pausing the game briefly.
      Parameters:
      scorer - The player who scored the goal.
